name: Nuclear Ninja
description:
This game was made in about 18 hours for the Totally Ranked Game Jam!

FULL SCREEN BUTTON IN BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER!

Music was done by Munkie Beets

Play as the Nuclear ninja as you traverse a nuclear power plant, determined to shut it downs before it explodes.

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Space to Jump

Z or J to Attack

X or K to Lantern Dash
